name: ...palindromes...plus (2009)
description:
Notes:
This game was released as a viral Flash game on November 17, 2009 and released vial Mochi Media's distribution.  It was sponsored by dictionary.com and reviewed by JayisGames.com.  It was played just about 2,000,000 times.

This version was packaged using the final version of the Zinc 4.0. Flash to EXE packager.   I've tried to locate the people who made zinc to buy a license from them, but so far that has been not fruitful, so this is presented for archival puropses only

Instructions:
unscramble the palindromes.
click any two letter tiles to swap positions.
each level contains up to six words.
you have 30 seconds to complete them all.
score bonus points for time left on the clock.
unused time added to next level.
